name: ACEBROZ-AC TAB
description: N-Acetylcysteine 600 mg + Acebrophylline 100 mg tablet is a fixed-dose combination used for respiratory disorders such as COPD, chronic and acute bronchitis, asthma, and other lung conditions with excessive mucus. N-Acetylcysteine acts as a mucolytic by breaking disulfide bonds in mucoproteins, thinning and loosening thick sputum, and also works as an antioxidant by replenishing glutathione and protecting lung tissue. Acebrophylline, a derivative of ambroxol and theophylline, provides bronchodilation by inhibiting phosphodiesterase and raising cAMP levels, relaxes airway smooth muscle, reduces airway inflammation by blocking phospholipase A2, regulates mucus secretion, and enhances surfactant production for better mucociliary clearance. Together, they ease breathing, reduce cough, and improve airflow. The usual adult dose is one tablet once or twice daily after meals, swallowed whole with water. Common side effects include nausea, vomiting, abdominal discomfort, mild diarrhea, headache, or dizziness; rarely, rash or bronchospasm may occur. It is contraindicated in hypersensitivity, severe liver or kidney disease, active peptic ulcer, or serious cardiac disorders. Caution is advised in the elderly, during pregnancy or breastfeeding, and in patients with heart disease; adequate hydration is recommended. Store in a cool, dry place below 25°C, away from moisture and children.

name: ACETEAL-T TAB
description: N-Acetylcysteine 150 mg + Taurine 5 mg tablet is commonly used as a hepatoprotective and antioxidant medicine to support liver health and protect cells from oxidative stress. N-Acetylcysteine (NAC) works by replenishing glutathione, a key antioxidant in the body, helping to neutralize harmful free radicals, detoxify the liver, and improve overall liver function. It is also a mucolytic agent that can thin and loosen mucus in the respiratory tract, making it easier to clear. Taurine is a sulfur-containing amino acid with antioxidant and membrane-stabilizing properties; it helps in bile salt formation, regulates calcium balance, and supports cardiovascular and nervous system health. Together, this combination protects the liver from drug- or toxin-induced damage, improves metabolism, and provides antioxidant benefits for better organ function. It is often prescribed in conditions like fatty liver, chronic hepatitis, alcoholic liver disease, drug-induced liver injury, or oxidative stress-related disorders. Possible side effects may include mild gastrointestinal upset such as nausea or abdominal discomfort, though it is generally well tolerated. The medicine should be used with caution in patients with severe kidney disease, during pregnancy, or breastfeeding, and only under medical supervision. Store in a cool, dry place away from direct light and moisture.

name: ACLOZ-MR TAB
description: Aceclofenac 100 mg + Paracetamol 325 mg + Chlorzoxazone 15 mg tablet is a combination medicine used for the treatment of pain, inflammation, and muscle spasms associated with musculoskeletal conditions such as back pain, sprains, strains, arthritis, cervical spondylitis, or post-traumatic pain. Aceclofenac is a nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drug (NSAID) that reduces pain and swelling by inhibiting prostaglandin synthesis. Paracetamol acts as an analgesic and antipyretic, enhancing pain relief and controlling fever. Chlorzoxazone is a centrally acting muscle relaxant that relieves muscle stiffness and spasm, improving mobility and comfort. Together, they provide quick and effective relief from pain, reduce muscle tension, and restore normal activity. The medicine should be taken with food to minimize gastric irritation. Common side effects may include nausea, heartburn, stomach upset, drowsiness, or dizziness; rarely, allergic reactions or liver function changes may occur. It is contraindicated in patients with severe liver, kidney, or gastrointestinal disorders, or hypersensitivity to any of the ingredients. Caution is advised during pregnancy, breastfeeding, and in patients consuming alcohol or other hepatotoxic drugs. This medicine should be used strictly under medical supervision and stored in a cool, dry place away from direct light and moisture.

name: ACLOZ-SP TAB
description: Aceclofenac 100 mg + Paracetamol 325 mg + Serratiopeptidase 15 mg tablet is a combination medicine used to relieve pain, inflammation, and swelling in various conditions such as arthritis, spondylitis, muscle pain, dental pain, post-surgical pain, and traumatic injuries. Aceclofenac is a nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drug (NSAID) that blocks prostaglandin synthesis to reduce pain and inflammation. Paracetamol acts as an analgesic and antipyretic, providing additional pain relief and lowering fever. Serratiopeptidase is a proteolytic enzyme with anti-inflammatory and anti-edematous properties that helps break down abnormal proteins at the site of inflammation, reducing swelling and promoting faster tissue healing. Together, this combination provides quicker and stronger relief from pain, stiffness, and swelling, improving mobility and recovery. The tablet should be taken with food to minimize gastric irritation. Common side effects may include nausea, indigestion, stomach discomfort, or dizziness; rarely, allergic reactions, gastric ulcers, or liver function disturbances may occur. It is contraindicated in patients with severe liver, kidney, or gastrointestinal diseases, bleeding disorders, or known hypersensitivity to any component. Caution is required during pregnancy, breastfeeding, and in patients consuming alcohol or other hepatotoxic drugs. Store in a cool, dry place away from moisture and sunlight.

name: ACLOZ-TH4 TAB
description: Aceclofenac 100 mg + Thiocolchicoside 4 mg tablet is a combination medicine commonly prescribed for the relief of pain, inflammation, and muscle stiffness associated with musculoskeletal disorders such as low back pain, cervical spondylitis, osteoarthritis, rheumatoid arthritis, sprains, strains, and traumatic injuries. Aceclofenac is a nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drug (NSAID) that works by inhibiting prostaglandin synthesis, thereby reducing pain, swelling, and inflammation. Thiocolchicoside is a muscle relaxant derived from colchicoside, acting on the central nervous system to reduce muscle spasms and improve mobility without causing significant sedation. Together, they provide effective relief from painful muscle contractions, stiffness, and joint discomfort, improving movement and quality of life. The tablet should be taken with food to reduce the risk of gastric irritation. Common side effects may include nausea, abdominal discomfort, diarrhea, dizziness, or drowsiness; rarely, allergic reactions, liver or kidney disturbances, and gastric irritation may occur. It is contraindicated in patients with severe liver, kidney, or gastrointestinal disorders, history of seizures, and in pregnancy or breastfeeding. Caution is advised in elderly patients and in those consuming alcohol or other hepatotoxic medicines. Store in a cool, dry place away from direct light and moisture, and use only under medical supervision.

name: AMLOAL-AT TAB
description: Amlodipine 5 mg + Atenolol 50 mg tablet is a fixed-dose combination used in the treatment of high blood pressure (hypertension) and certain heart conditions such as angina and arrhythmia. Amlodipine is a calcium channel blocker that relaxes and widens blood vessels by inhibiting calcium influx in vascular smooth muscle, which lowers blood pressure and improves blood flow to the heart. Atenolol is a selective beta-1 blocker that slows the heart rate, reduces cardiac workload, and lowers blood pressure by blocking the effects of adrenaline on the heart. Together, this combination provides more effective control of hypertension, reduces the risk of complications such as heart attack and stroke, and helps relieve chest pain related to angina. The tablet is usually taken once daily, with or without food, at the same time each day. Common side effects may include dizziness, headache, fatigue, slow heartbeat, ankle swelling, or stomach upset; rarely, breathing difficulty, severe hypotension, or allergic reactions may occur. It should be avoided in patients with severe heart block, uncontrolled heart failure, very low blood pressure, or hypersensitivity to either drug. Use with caution in asthma, diabetes, kidney or liver disease, and only under strict medical supervision.

name: AMLOAZ 2.5 TAB
description: Amlodipine 2.5 mg tablet is a calcium channel blocker used to treat high blood pressure (hypertension) and angina (chest pain due to reduced blood flow to the heart). It works by relaxing and widening the blood vessels, which improves blood flow, reduces the heart’s workload, and helps maintain controlled blood pressure, thereby lowering the risk of heart attack, stroke, and kidney damage. In angina, it prevents chest pain episodes by increasing oxygen supply to the heart muscle. The medicine is usually taken once daily, with or without food, at the same time each day, and the dose may be adjusted by the doctor based on the patient’s condition. Common side effects can include headache, dizziness, flushing, swelling of ankles or feet, fatigue, or stomach discomfort; most are mild and temporary. Serious but rare effects may include irregular heartbeat, severe dizziness, or allergic reactions. It should not be stopped suddenly without medical advice, as this may worsen the condition. Caution is advised in patients with severe heart, liver, or kidney disease, and during pregnancy or breastfeeding. The medicine should be stored in a cool, dry place away from light and taken strictly under medical supervision.

name: AMLOAZ 5 TAB
description: Amlodipine 5 mg tablet is a calcium channel blocker widely used to treat high blood pressure (hypertension) and chest pain caused by angina, as well as to prevent certain types of heart-related complications such as heart attack and stroke. It works by relaxing and widening the blood vessels, which lowers blood pressure, improves blood flow, and reduces the strain on the heart. By enhancing oxygen supply to the heart muscle, it also helps prevent angina attacks and improves exercise tolerance. The medicine is usually taken once daily, with or without food, preferably at the same time each day, and dosage is adjusted based on individual response. Common side effects include headache, dizziness, flushing, swelling of the ankles or feet, tiredness, or stomach discomfort, most of which are temporary. Rare but serious effects may involve irregular heartbeat, fainting, or allergic reactions. It should not be discontinued suddenly without medical advice, as this may worsen symptoms. Caution is required in patients with severe heart, liver, or kidney problems, and during pregnancy or breastfeeding. The tablets should be stored in a cool, dry place away from moisture and sunlight, and taken strictly under a doctor’s supervision.

name: ATORIZ 10 TAB
description: Atorvastatin 10 mg tablet belongs to the class of statins and is used to lower high cholesterol and triglyceride levels in the blood, thereby reducing the risk of heart disease, stroke, and related complications. It works by inhibiting the enzyme HMG-CoA reductase in the liver, which plays a key role in cholesterol synthesis, leading to reduced “bad” LDL cholesterol and triglycerides while increasing “good” HDL cholesterol. This helps prevent the buildup of plaque in blood vessels and improves blood flow. The medicine is usually taken once daily, with or without food, at the same time each day, along with a healthy diet, exercise, and lifestyle changes for best results. Common side effects may include headache, stomach upset, constipation, muscle pain, or weakness, which are usually mild. Rarely, it may cause serious effects like severe muscle breakdown (rhabdomyolysis) or liver problems; medical attention is needed if unexplained muscle pain, dark urine, or yellowing of the skin or eyes occurs. It is contraindicated in patients with active liver disease, during pregnancy or breastfeeding, and should be used cautiously in those consuming alcohol or with kidney impairment. Store in a cool, dry place away from light and moisture, and use strictly under medical supervision.

name: ATORIZ 40 TAB
description: Atorvastatin 40 mg tablet is a statin medicine prescribed to lower elevated cholesterol and triglyceride levels in the blood and to reduce the risk of serious cardiovascular events such as heart attack, stroke, and angina. It works by inhibiting the liver enzyme HMG-CoA reductase, which reduces cholesterol production, thereby lowering “bad” LDL cholesterol and triglycerides while raising “good” HDL cholesterol. By controlling cholesterol, it helps prevent plaque buildup in arteries and supports better blood circulation. The 40 mg strength is generally used in patients who require a higher dose to achieve target cholesterol levels. The medicine is taken once daily, with or without food, preferably at the same time each day, along with a cholesterol-lowering diet and lifestyle modifications such as exercise and weight control. Common side effects include headache, indigestion, constipation, muscle pain, or fatigue, which are usually mild. Rarely, it may cause liver enzyme abnormalities or muscle breakdown (rhabdomyolysis), so any unexplained muscle pain, dark urine, or jaundice should be reported immediately. It is contraindicated in active liver disease, pregnancy, and breastfeeding, and should be used with caution in alcohol users or those with kidney impairment. Store in a cool, dry place away from moisture and sunlight, and take only under medical supervision.

name: ATORIZ-A 10/75 CAP
description: Atorvastatin 10 mg + Aspirin 75 mg capsule is a fixed-dose combination commonly prescribed for the prevention of heart attack, stroke, and other cardiovascular complications in patients at risk of or with existing heart disease. Atorvastatin is a statin that lowers “bad” LDL cholesterol and triglycerides while increasing “good” HDL cholesterol by inhibiting the HMG-CoA reductase enzyme, thereby preventing plaque buildup in arteries and improving blood flow. Aspirin is an antiplatelet agent that prevents platelets from clumping together, reducing the risk of blood clots that can block vessels and cause heart attack or stroke. Together, they provide dual protection by controlling cholesterol and reducing clot formation. The capsule is usually taken once daily with water, preferably after food, and should be continued along with a healthy lifestyle including diet control, exercise, and avoiding smoking or excess alcohol. Common side effects may include stomach upset, acidity, constipation, muscle pain, or mild bleeding tendencies like easy bruising. Rarely, serious effects like gastrointestinal bleeding, liver dysfunction, or muscle breakdown (rhabdomyolysis) may occur. It is contraindicated in patients with active liver disease, bleeding disorders, peptic ulcers, pregnancy, or breastfeeding, and should be used cautiously in those with kidney disease or alcohol consumption. Store in a cool, dry place away from moisture and sunlight, and take strictly under medical guidance.

name: ATORIZ-A 20/75 CAP
description: Atorvastatin 20 mg + Aspirin 75 mg capsule is a combination medicine prescribed for the prevention of heart attack, stroke, and other complications in patients with high cholesterol, hypertension, diabetes, or established cardiovascular disease. Atorvastatin is a statin that works by inhibiting the HMG-CoA reductase enzyme in the liver, lowering “bad” LDL cholesterol and triglycerides while raising “good” HDL cholesterol, thus slowing plaque buildup in arteries and improving blood circulation. Aspirin is an antiplatelet drug that prevents blood platelets from sticking together, reducing the risk of clot formation that could block blood vessels. Together, this capsule provides dual protection by controlling cholesterol levels and preventing clot-related events, thereby lowering cardiovascular risk. It is usually taken once daily after food along with lifestyle changes such as a low-fat diet, regular exercise, and avoiding smoking or excess alcohol. Common side effects include stomach irritation, acidity, constipation, headache, dizziness, or muscle pain, while rare but serious effects may include gastrointestinal bleeding, liver enzyme abnormalities, or muscle breakdown. It should not be used in patients with active liver disease, bleeding disorders, peptic ulcers, pregnancy, or breastfeeding, and requires caution in those with kidney disease or high alcohol intake. Store in a cool, dry place away from moisture and sunlight, and take only under medical supervision.

name: ATORIZ-GOLD 10 CAP
description: Atorvastatin 10 mg + Aspirin 75 mg + Clopidogrel 75 mg capsule is a fixed-dose combination used for the prevention of heart attack, stroke, and other cardiovascular complications in patients with high cholesterol, diabetes, hypertension, or a history of coronary artery disease. Atorvastatin is a statin that lowers “bad” LDL cholesterol and triglycerides while raising “good” HDL cholesterol by inhibiting HMG-CoA reductase, thereby slowing plaque buildup in arteries. Aspirin is an antiplatelet agent that prevents platelets from clumping, reducing the risk of clot formation, while Clopidogrel is another antiplatelet drug that works by blocking ADP receptors on platelets, providing stronger and complementary protection against blood clots. Together, this triple combination controls cholesterol, prevents clot formation, improves blood flow, and lowers the risk of serious cardiac or cerebrovascular events. The capsule is usually taken once daily after food along with lifestyle measures such as a balanced diet, exercise, and avoiding smoking or excess alcohol. Common side effects include stomach irritation, acidity, headache, dizziness, or muscle pain; rarely, gastrointestinal bleeding, liver enzyme abnormalities, or severe muscle injury may occur. It is contraindicated in patients with active liver disease, bleeding disorders, peptic ulcers, pregnancy, or breastfeeding, and should be used cautiously in kidney disease or alcohol users. Store in a cool, dry place away from moisture and sunlight, and use only under strict medical supervision.

name: ATORIZ-GOLD 20 CAP
description: Atorvastatin 20 mg + Aspirin 75 mg + Clopidogrel 75 mg capsule is a combination medicine prescribed for the prevention of heart attack, stroke, and other complications in patients with high cholesterol, hypertension, diabetes, or established cardiovascular disease. Atorvastatin is a statin that lowers “bad” LDL cholesterol and triglycerides while raising “good” HDL cholesterol by inhibiting the HMG-CoA reductase enzyme, thereby reducing plaque buildup in arteries and improving blood flow. Aspirin is an antiplatelet agent that prevents platelets from sticking together, reducing the risk of clot formation, while Clopidogrel is another potent antiplatelet drug that blocks ADP receptors on platelets, providing additional and complementary protection against harmful clots. Together, this triple therapy reduces cholesterol, prevents blood clot formation, improves circulation, and lowers the overall risk of cardiovascular events such as heart attack and stroke. The capsule is usually taken once daily after food, along with lifestyle changes including a low-fat diet, exercise, and avoiding smoking or excess alcohol. Common side effects may include stomach upset, acidity, dizziness, headache, or muscle pain, while rare but serious effects include gastrointestinal bleeding, liver dysfunction, or severe muscle injury. It is contraindicated in patients with active liver disease, peptic ulcers, bleeding disorders, pregnancy, or breastfeeding, and should be used cautiously in those with kidney disease or heavy alcohol use. Store in a cool, dry place away from light and moisture, and use only under strict medical guidance.

name: AZATHOL 50 TAB
description: Azathioprine 50 mg tablet is an immunosuppressant drug used to prevent organ rejection after kidney and other transplants, and to manage autoimmune diseases such as rheumatoid arthritis, systemic lupus erythematosus, inflammatory bowel disease (Crohn’s disease, ulcerative colitis), autoimmune hepatitis, and certain skin or blood disorders. It works by inhibiting the production of DNA in rapidly dividing immune cells, thereby suppressing abnormal immune responses, reducing inflammation, and preventing the body from attacking its own tissues or a transplanted organ. The medicine is taken orally in doses adjusted by the doctor based on body weight and medical condition, and requires regular monitoring. Common side effects include nausea, vomiting, diarrhea, loss of appetite, or fatigue, while serious adverse effects may include bone marrow suppression leading to low blood counts, liver toxicity, pancreatitis, increased infection risk, or rarely, certain cancers after long-term use. Regular blood tests for liver function and blood counts are essential during therapy. It should not be used in pregnancy, breastfeeding, or in patients with severe infections or known hypersensitivity. Caution is advised in those with liver or kidney disease, and alcohol should be avoided. Store in a cool, dry place away from sunlight and moisture, and use only under strict medical supervision.

name: BECOZEAL-PLUS CAP
description: Vitamin B-Complex + Mineral + Trace Elements capsule is a nutritional supplement used to prevent or treat vitamin and mineral deficiencies and to support overall health, energy production, and well-being. It contains essential B vitamins (such as B1, B2, B3, B5, B6, B12, folic acid, and biotin) that help in carbohydrate, protein, and fat metabolism, improve nerve function, support red blood cell formation, and reduce weakness or fatigue. The added minerals (like calcium, magnesium, zinc, iron, etc.) and trace elements (such as copper, manganese, selenium, and iodine) are vital for maintaining bone strength, muscle function, immunity, hormone regulation, and antioxidant protection. This combination is often prescribed during periods of physical or mental stress, recovery from illness or surgery, poor dietary intake, chronic diseases, or conditions that increase nutritional requirements. Common benefits include improved energy, better concentration, healthier skin, hair, and nails, and stronger immunity. Side effects are rare but may include mild stomach upset, nausea, or allergic reactions in sensitive individuals. It should be taken after food with water as advised by the doctor, and excessive use should be avoided to prevent toxicity. Store in a cool, dry place away from moisture and sunlight, and keep out of reach of children.

attributes.CONTAIN: Vitamin B-Complex + Mineral + Trace Elements Capsule

name: BILAZEAL-M TAB
description: Bilastine 20 mg + Montelukast 10 mg tablet is an anti-allergic combination used in the management of allergic rhinitis, seasonal allergies, hay fever, and asthma-related symptoms such as sneezing, runny nose, nasal congestion, watery eyes, and breathing difficulty. Bilastine is a non-sedating antihistamine that works by blocking H1 histamine receptors, thereby reducing itching, redness, swelling, and other allergic reactions without causing significant drowsiness. Montelukast is a leukotriene receptor antagonist that blocks leukotrienes, inflammatory chemicals responsible for airway narrowing, swelling, and excess mucus secretion, thus preventing asthma attacks and controlling long-term allergy symptoms. Together, they provide dual action by relieving nasal and eye allergy symptoms while also improving airway function and preventing breathing difficulties. The medicine is usually taken once daily, preferably in the evening, as prescribed by the doctor. Common side effects may include headache, abdominal pain, diarrhea, or mild drowsiness, while rare but serious effects may involve mood changes, liver dysfunction, or severe allergic reactions. It should be avoided in patients with known hypersensitivity and used cautiously in those with liver or psychiatric disorders. Store in a cool, dry place away from sunlight and moisture, and take only under strict medical supervision.

name: BISOP 5 TAB
description: Bisoprolol 5 mg tablet is a beta-blocker medicine used in the treatment of high blood pressure (hypertension), angina (chest pain), and heart failure, and to prevent complications such as heart attack or stroke. It works by selectively blocking beta-1 adrenergic receptors in the heart, which slows down the heart rate, reduces the force of contraction, and lowers the heart’s oxygen demand, thereby reducing blood pressure and improving heart function. By controlling blood pressure and heart workload, it helps protect blood vessels, kidneys, and other organs from damage. The medicine is usually taken once daily, with or without food, at the same time each day, and dosage is individualized by the doctor. Common side effects may include fatigue, dizziness, headache, slow heartbeat, cold hands or feet, or stomach upset, while rare but serious effects include very low heart rate, breathing difficulty, or worsening of heart failure. It should not be stopped suddenly without medical advice, as this may worsen symptoms. The drug is contraindicated in patients with severe heart block, untreated heart failure, very low blood pressure, or known hypersensitivity, and should be used cautiously in asthma, diabetes, kidney or liver disease. Store in a cool, dry place away from sunlight and moisture, and use only under medical supervision.

name: CALCIZEAL 500 TAB
description: Calcium 500 mg + Vitamin D3 250 IU tablet is a nutritional supplement used to prevent and treat calcium and vitamin D deficiency and to support healthy bones, teeth, and muscles. Calcium is an essential mineral required for bone strength, nerve function, muscle contraction, and normal heart rhythm, while Vitamin D3 (cholecalciferol) helps the body absorb calcium and phosphorus from the intestine and maintain proper blood calcium levels. Together, they are commonly prescribed for osteoporosis, osteopenia, rickets, osteomalacia, pregnancy, lactation, postmenopausal bone loss, and in individuals with poor dietary intake or higher calcium requirements. This combination reduces the risk of fractures, improves bone mineral density, and supports overall musculoskeletal health. The tablet is usually taken once or twice daily after meals with water, as directed by the doctor. Side effects are generally mild and may include constipation, bloating, nausea, or stomach upset; rarely, prolonged high doses may cause kidney stones, high calcium levels, or kidney dysfunction. It is contraindicated in patients with hypercalcemia, severe kidney disease, or known hypersensitivity. Adequate hydration and avoidance of excess calcium-rich supplements are advised. Store in a cool, dry place away from sunlight and moisture, and use strictly under medical guidance.

attributes.CONTAIN: Calcium 500 Mg + Vitamin D3 250 IU Tablet

name: CALCIZEAL-CT CAP
description: Calcium Carbonate 500 mg + Calcitriol 0.25 mcg + Zinc 7.5 mg capsule is a nutritional supplement used to maintain strong bones, improve calcium absorption, and correct deficiencies in calcium, vitamin D, and zinc. Calcium carbonate provides elemental calcium essential for bone formation, teeth strength, nerve conduction, muscle contraction, and heart function. Calcitriol, the active form of vitamin D3, enhances calcium and phosphorus absorption from the intestine, maintains blood calcium levels, and prevents conditions like osteoporosis, osteomalacia, and rickets. Zinc supports immune function, wound healing, growth, and enzymatic activities, while also contributing to bone health. This combination is commonly prescribed in osteoporosis, postmenopausal bone loss, fractures, chronic kidney disease, hypocalcemia, and conditions with increased calcium demand such as pregnancy or lactation. The capsule is usually taken once daily after meals with water, as directed by the physician. Side effects are generally mild and may include stomach upset, constipation, metallic taste, or nausea; rarely, excessive intake may cause hypercalcemia, kidney stones, or abdominal pain. It should be avoided in patients with high calcium levels, severe kidney problems, or hypersensitivity to any ingredient. Store in a cool, dry place away from direct sunlight and moisture, and take only under medical supervision.

attributes.CONTAIN: Calcium Carbonate 500 Mg + Calcitriol 0.25 Mcg + Zinc 7.5 Mg Capsule

name: CALCIZEAL-D3 60K CAP
description: Cholecalciferol (Vitamin D3) 60,000 IU capsule is a high-strength vitamin D supplement used to treat and prevent vitamin D deficiency and related conditions such as osteoporosis, osteomalacia, rickets, and bone weakness. Vitamin D3 helps the body absorb calcium and phosphorus from the intestine, thereby maintaining healthy bones, teeth, and muscles, while also supporting immunity and overall well-being. This supplement is often prescribed in individuals with low sun exposure, elderly patients, postmenopausal women, pregnant or lactating women, and those with chronic illnesses that affect vitamin D absorption. The capsule is usually taken once weekly or as directed by the doctor, preferably after meals to enhance absorption. Common side effects are rare but may include nausea, constipation, headache, or abdominal discomfort; excessive intake can cause high calcium levels leading to kidney stones, weakness, or irregular heartbeat. It should not be used in patients with hypercalcemia, severe kidney problems, or known hypersensitivity to vitamin D. Regular monitoring of vitamin D and calcium levels may be advised during prolonged use. Store in a cool, dry place away from direct sunlight and moisture, and use strictly under medical supervision to avoid overdose.

name: CALCIZEAL-D3 SACHET
description: Cholecalciferol (Vitamin D3) 60,000 IU sachet is a high-dose vitamin D supplement used to treat and prevent vitamin D deficiency and associated conditions such as osteoporosis, osteomalacia, rickets, and general bone weakness. Vitamin D3 plays a vital role in regulating calcium and phosphorus absorption, maintaining strong bones and teeth, improving muscle strength, and supporting immune system function. This sachet form is usually available as granules, which are mixed with milk or water and taken orally, making it easier to consume compared to capsules. It is commonly prescribed once weekly or as directed by the physician, particularly for individuals with low sunlight exposure, elderly patients, pregnant and breastfeeding women, and those with poor dietary intake or chronic conditions affecting vitamin D absorption. Side effects are uncommon but may include nausea, constipation, headache, or stomach discomfort, while excessive use can cause high calcium levels, kidney stones, or weakness. It should be avoided in patients with hypercalcemia, severe kidney disorders, or hypersensitivity to vitamin D. Regular monitoring of calcium and vitamin D levels may be recommended during long-term use. Store in a cool, dry place away from moisture and direct sunlight, and take only under medical guidance.

name: CALCIZEAL-K2 7M TAB
description: Calcium Citrate 1000 mg + Calcitriol 0.25 mcg + Vitamin K2-7 45 mcg + Magnesium 50 mg + Zinc 7.5 mg + Methylcobalamin 1000 mcg + L-Methylfolate Calcium tablet is a comprehensive nutritional supplement designed to support bone health, nerve function, and overall well-being. Calcium citrate provides easily absorbed calcium for strong bones and teeth, while calcitriol (active vitamin D3) enhances calcium absorption and prevents bone disorders like osteoporosis and osteomalacia. Vitamin K2-7 helps direct calcium to bones and prevents deposition in blood vessels, reducing cardiovascular risk. Magnesium and zinc aid in bone strength, muscle function, and immunity. Methylcobalamin (active vitamin B12) supports nerve health, red blood cell formation, and energy production, while L-methylfolate (active folate) improves cell growth, DNA synthesis, and anemia management. This combination is especially useful in osteoporosis, fractures, postmenopausal bone loss, chronic illnesses, and conditions with increased nutritional needs such as pregnancy or old age. Common side effects are rare and may include mild stomach upset, nausea, or constipation; excessive intake may cause hypercalcemia, kidney stones, or imbalances. It should be used cautiously in patients with kidney disease, high calcium levels, or hypersensitivity. Store in a cool, dry place, away from sunlight and moisture, and use only under medical supervision.

description: Glucosamine Sulphate 500 mg + Collagen Peptide Type-II 200 mg + Chondroitin Sulphate Sodium 100 mg + Rosehip Extract 10 mg + Ginger Extract 10 mg + Boswellia Extract 2 mg + Vitamin D3 200 IU + Vitamin B12 1 mcg + Zinc 5 mg + Copper 1 mcg + Sodium Hyaluronate 30 mg tablet is a comprehensive joint health supplement formulated to improve mobility, flexibility, and reduce joint pain and stiffness. Rosehip, ginger, and boswellia extracts provide natural anti-inflammatory and antioxidant effects, reducing swelling and improving comfort in arthritis and joint disorders. This combination is commonly used in osteoarthritis, rheumatoid arthritis, sports injuries, and age-related joint degeneration to reduce pain, improve movement, and slow cartilage breakdown. Side effects are rare but may include mild stomach upset, nausea, or headache. It should be avoided in patients with known hypersensitivity, severe kidney/liver disease, or bleeding disorders. Store in a cool, dry place away from sunlight and moisture, and use strictly under medical supervision.

name: CILNIZ 10 TAB
description: Cilnidipine 10 mg tablet is a calcium channel blocker used in the treatment of high blood pressure (hypertension) and certain heart-related conditions. It works by blocking both L-type calcium channels in blood vessels and N-type calcium channels in nerves, which helps relax and widen blood vessels, improve blood flow, and reduce strain on the heart. By lowering blood pressure, it reduces the risk of complications such as stroke, heart attack, and kidney damage. Unlike some other calcium channel blockers, cilnidipine has the added benefit of reducing sympathetic nerve activity, which helps control blood pressure more effectively and lowers the chance of reflex tachycardia (fast heartbeat). It is usually taken once daily, with or without food, as prescribed by the doctor. Common side effects may include dizziness, headache, flushing, swelling of ankles, or fatigue, which are generally mild and temporary. Rare but serious effects can include very low blood pressure, irregular heartbeat, or allergic reactions. It should be used cautiously in patients with severe heart, liver, or kidney disease, and it should not be stopped suddenly without medical advice. Store in a cool, dry place away from sunlight and moisture, and take only under medical supervision.

name: CILNIZ 20 TAB
description: Cilnidipine 20 mg tablet is a calcium channel blocker used to manage high blood pressure (hypertension) and protect against related complications such as stroke, heart attack, and kidney damage. It works by blocking L-type calcium channels in blood vessels, causing them to relax and widen, which lowers blood pressure, and N-type calcium channels in nerves, reducing excessive sympathetic nerve activity that contributes to hypertension. This dual action helps improve blood flow, decrease strain on the heart, and avoid reflex tachycardia, a common side effect of some other calcium channel blockers. Cilnidipine 20 mg is often prescribed when lower doses are insufficient to control blood pressure, and it is usually taken once daily, with or without food, as directed by the physician. Common side effects may include dizziness, flushing, ankle swelling, fatigue, or mild headache, which are generally temporary. Rarely, it may cause very low blood pressure, irregular heartbeat, or allergic reactions. The medicine should be used cautiously in patients with severe liver, kidney, or heart disease and should not be stopped suddenly without medical guidance. Store in a cool, dry place away from direct sunlight and moisture, and take strictly under medical supervision.

name: CILNIZ-T 40 TAB
description: Telmisartan 40 mg + Cilnidipine 10 mg tablet is a combination medicine used for the effective management of high blood pressure (hypertension) and to reduce the risk of complications such as heart attack, stroke, and kidney damage. Telmisartan is an angiotensin II receptor blocker (ARB) that prevents blood vessels from narrowing by blocking the action of angiotensin II, thereby lowering blood pressure and improving blood flow. Cilnidipine is a novel calcium channel blocker that works on both L-type and N-type calcium channels, helping relax and widen blood vessels while also reducing excessive sympathetic nerve activity, which provides better blood pressure control and minimizes reflex tachycardia. Together, they provide dual action in controlling hypertension, protecting the heart, kidneys, and blood vessels. The tablet is usually taken once daily, with or without food, as prescribed by the doctor. Common side effects may include dizziness, headache, ankle swelling, flushing, tiredness, or stomach upset, which are generally mild and temporary. Rare but serious effects include very low blood pressure, irregular heartbeat, or allergic reactions. It should be used cautiously in patients with liver, kidney, or severe heart problems and should not be stopped abruptly without medical advice. Store in a cool, dry place away from sunlight and moisture, and use only under medical supervision.

name: CITIZEAL-P 800 TAB
description: Citicoline 500 mg + Piracetam 800 mg tablet is a nootropic (brain booster) combination used to improve memory, focus, and overall brain function, especially in neurological conditions. Citicoline is a neuroprotective agent that supports the repair of damaged nerve cells, enhances the synthesis of neurotransmitters like acetylcholine, and improves blood flow to the brain, which aids recovery after stroke, brain injury, or in cognitive disorders. Piracetam is a nootropic that improves communication between nerve cells, enhances oxygen and glucose utilization in the brain, and helps protect against memory decline, confusion, or learning difficulties. Together, they are prescribed in the treatment of stroke recovery, dementia, Alzheimer’s disease, Parkinson’s disease, age-related memory loss, vertigo, and other cognitive or neurodegenerative disorders. This combination improves mental alertness, concentration, and learning capacity while reducing symptoms like dizziness, forgetfulness, and impaired coordination. Common side effects may include headache, nausea, abdominal discomfort, insomnia, or nervousness; serious side effects are rare but may include allergic reactions or mood changes. The medicine should be taken exactly as prescribed, with or without food, and not stopped suddenly without medical advice. Store in a cool, dry place away from moisture and sunlight, and use strictly under medical supervision.

name: CLOPIZEAL 75 TAB
description: Clopidogrel 75 mg tablet is an antiplatelet medicine used to prevent blood clots in patients at risk of heart attack, stroke, or other cardiovascular problems. It works by inhibiting platelet aggregation, meaning it prevents platelets in the blood from sticking together and forming clots, thereby ensuring smooth blood flow through the arteries. It is commonly prescribed after a recent heart attack, stroke, angioplasty, or in patients with peripheral artery disease and other circulatory disorders. By reducing the risk of clot formation, clopidogrel lowers the chances of serious heart and brain complications. The medicine is usually taken once daily, with or without food, exactly as directed by the doctor. Common side effects may include stomach upset, diarrhea, or easy bruising, while serious but rare side effects include severe bleeding, black or bloody stools, unexplained weakness, or allergic reactions. It should not be stopped suddenly without medical advice, as this may increase the risk of clotting. Caution is advised in patients with bleeding disorders, recent surgery, liver disease, or those taking other anticoagulant or antiplatelet medicines. Store in a cool, dry place away from moisture and sunlight, and take strictly under medical supervision.

name: CLOPIZEAL-A 75 TAB
description: Clopidogrel 75 mg + Aspirin 75 mg tablet is a dual antiplatelet medicine used to prevent blood clots and reduce the risk of serious heart and brain complications such as heart attack, stroke, or blockage in blood vessels. Aspirin works by inhibiting the enzyme that makes thromboxane, a chemical that triggers platelets to clump together, while clopidogrel blocks ADP receptors on platelets, further reducing their ability to stick and form clots. Together, they provide stronger and broader protection against clot formation than when used alone. This combination is commonly prescribed after angioplasty, stent placement, heart attack, ischemic stroke, or in patients with unstable angina and peripheral artery disease. It helps maintain smooth blood flow and prevents re-blockage of arteries. The tablet is usually taken once daily with water, as directed by the doctor. Common side effects include stomach upset, indigestion, bruising, or mild bleeding, while serious but rare risks involve severe bleeding, black or bloody stools, unexplained weakness, or allergic reactions. It should be avoided in patients with active bleeding, stomach ulcers, bleeding disorders, or severe liver disease. Regular medical supervision is essential to monitor safety. Store in a cool, dry place away from sunlight and moisture, and never stop treatment abruptly without a doctor’s advice.

name: DAPAZEAL 10 TAB
description: Dapagliflozin 10 mg tablet is an antidiabetic medicine belonging to the class of SGLT2 (sodium-glucose co-transporter 2) inhibitors, used to manage type 2 diabetes mellitus and reduce the risk of complications such as kidney damage, heart disease, and stroke. It works by blocking SGLT2 proteins in the kidneys, which reduces glucose reabsorption and increases glucose excretion through urine, thereby lowering blood sugar levels. In addition to improving glycemic control, dapagliflozin may also aid in weight reduction, lower blood pressure, and provide protective effects on the heart and kidneys, making it beneficial for patients with type 2 diabetes who also have cardiovascular or renal risk factors. The tablet is usually taken once daily, with or without food, as prescribed by the doctor. Common side effects may include frequent urination, urinary tract infections, genital infections, or mild dehydration; rare but serious effects include ketoacidosis, severe urinary infections, or kidney problems. It should not be used in patients with type 1 diabetes, severe kidney impairment, or diabetic ketoacidosis. Adequate hydration is important while on this medicine. Store in a cool, dry place away from moisture and sunlight, and take only under strict medical supervision.

name: DAPAZEAL-M 10/500 TAB
description: Dapagliflozin 10 mg + Metformin 500 mg tablet is a combination antidiabetic medicine used to control high blood sugar in patients with type 2 diabetes mellitus and to reduce the risk of diabetes-related complications such as kidney damage, heart disease, stroke, and nerve problems. Dapagliflozin is an SGLT2 inhibitor that lowers blood glucose by blocking glucose reabsorption in the kidneys, increasing its excretion through urine, while Metformin is a biguanide that decreases glucose production in the liver, improves insulin sensitivity, and enhances glucose uptake by muscles. Together, they provide dual action to achieve better blood sugar control, help in weight management, and improve cardiovascular and renal outcomes. This medicine is usually taken once or twice daily with meals to reduce stomach upset, strictly as advised by the doctor. Common side effects may include frequent urination, urinary or genital infections, nausea, diarrhea, or stomach discomfort, while rare but serious effects may include lactic acidosis, ketoacidosis, or kidney problems. It should not be used in patients with type 1 diabetes, severe kidney or liver disease, or diabetic ketoacidosis. Adequate hydration and regular monitoring of kidney function and blood sugar are recommended. Store in a cool, dry place away from sunlight and moisture, and use only under medical supervision.

name: DAPAZEAL-VG 10/100 TAB
description: Dapagliflozin 10 mg + Vildagliptin 100 mg tablet is an oral antidiabetic combination used to manage type 2 diabetes mellitus and reduce the risk of complications such as heart disease, kidney damage, and stroke. Dapagliflozin is an SGLT2 inhibitor that works by preventing glucose reabsorption in the kidneys, thereby increasing glucose excretion through urine and lowering blood sugar levels. Vildagliptin is a DPP-4 inhibitor that enhances the action of incretin hormones, which increase insulin release after meals and decrease glucagon secretion, thus improving blood sugar control. Together, this dual therapy provides effective glycemic management, supports weight reduction, improves insulin sensitivity, and may offer cardiovascular and renal protection. The tablet is usually taken once daily, with or without food, as prescribed by the doctor. Common side effects may include urinary tract infections, genital infections, frequent urination, headache, or stomach upset, while rare but serious risks include pancreatitis, ketoacidosis, or severe kidney problems. This medicine should not be used in patients with type 1 diabetes, diabetic ketoacidosis, or severe kidney or liver disease. Adequate hydration, healthy diet, and regular exercise should be maintained alongside treatment. Store in a cool, dry place away from sunlight and moisture, and use strictly under medical supervision.

name: DEFAZ 6 TAB
description: Deflazacort 6 mg tablet is a corticosteroid medicine used to reduce inflammation and suppress overactive immune responses in various conditions such as asthma, arthritis, allergies, autoimmune disorders, nephrotic syndrome, and certain skin or eye diseases. It works by decreasing the release of inflammatory substances in the body, thereby relieving symptoms like swelling, pain, redness, and breathing difficulty. Deflazacort is also commonly prescribed in Duchenne muscular dystrophy to slow disease progression and improve muscle strength. Compared to some other steroids, it may cause fewer side effects related to weight gain or bone loss, but long-term use still requires careful monitoring. The tablet is usually taken once daily, preferably after food, exactly as directed by the doctor. Common side effects may include increased appetite, weight gain, mood changes, indigestion, or trouble sleeping, while prolonged use can lead to weaker bones, high blood sugar, infections, or hormonal imbalance. The dose should never be stopped suddenly without medical advice, as it may cause withdrawal symptoms. It should be used cautiously in patients with diabetes, hypertension, infections, or osteoporosis. Store in a cool, dry place away from moisture and sunlight, and always take it under strict medical supervision.

name: DICLOZEAL 50 MG GEL
description: Diclofenac 1.16% + Linseed Oil 3% + Methyl Salicylate 10% + Menthol 5% gel is a topical pain-relieving and anti-inflammatory formulation used to treat muscle pain, joint pain, sprains, strains, backache, arthritis, and sports injuries. Diclofenac is a non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drug (NSAID) that reduces pain, swelling, and inflammation by blocking prostaglandin production. Linseed oil acts as an anti-inflammatory and enhances the absorption of diclofenac through the skin. Methyl salicylate provides a warming effect that improves blood circulation at the affected site, while menthol offers a cooling sensation that soothes pain and reduces discomfort. Together, these ingredients provide fast relief from pain, stiffness, and swelling, improving mobility and flexibility. The gel is applied directly to the affected area and gently massaged until absorbed, usually 2–3 times a day or as directed by the physician. Common side effects are mild and localized, such as skin irritation, redness, itching, or burning at the application site, which usually resolve on their own. It should not be applied on broken skin, open wounds, or near the eyes and mucous membranes. The gel is for external use only and should be stored in a cool, dry place away from heat and direct sunlight. Use strictly under medical guidance.

name: E-VITAZ 400 CAP
description: Vitamin E 400 capsule (soft gelatin) is a dietary supplement that provides a powerful antioxidant essential for protecting cells from oxidative stress and free radical damage. It supports healthy skin by promoting hydration, elasticity, and healing, making it beneficial in conditions like dry skin, scars, and stretch marks. Vitamin E also plays a role in boosting immunity, maintaining cardiovascular health, improving blood circulation, and supporting nerve and muscle function. It may help reduce oxidative stress in chronic diseases and slow down cell aging. The soft gelatin form ensures better absorption and easy swallowing. This supplement is commonly used in cases of Vitamin E deficiency, certain skin disorders, or as part of supportive therapy in cardiovascular and neurological conditions. It is generally well tolerated, though high doses may rarely cause side effects such as nausea, headache, diarrhea, or stomach discomfort. It should be taken as advised by a healthcare professional, preferably after meals to enhance absorption. The capsule should be stored in a cool, dry place, away from heat and direct sunlight.

name: ECITOZ 10 TAB
description: Escitalopram 10 mg tablet is an antidepressant belonging to the selective serotonin reuptake inhibitor (SSRI) class, used primarily to treat depression, generalized anxiety disorder (GAD), panic disorder, social anxiety, and obsessive-compulsive disorder (OCD). It works by increasing serotonin levels in the brain, a neurotransmitter that helps regulate mood, emotions, and behavior, thereby relieving symptoms such as persistent sadness, nervousness, restlessness, and loss of interest. Regular use improves mood, sleep quality, energy, and overall daily functioning. It is usually taken once daily, with or without food, as prescribed by a doctor. Common side effects may include nausea, headache, dry mouth, dizziness, sleep disturbances, or fatigue, which are often mild and temporary. Serious side effects such as mood changes, suicidal thoughts, or irregular heartbeat are rare but require immediate medical attention. Stopping the medication suddenly should be avoided, as it may cause withdrawal symptoms; tapering should be done under medical supervision. Escitalopram is not habit-forming but should be used strictly as directed. Caution is advised in patients with liver disease, heart conditions, or those taking other medicines that affect serotonin levels. Store in a cool, dry place away from moisture and direct sunlight.

name: ECITOZ-FORTE TAB
description: Escitalopram 10 mg + Clonazepam 0.5 mg tablet is a combination medicine used to manage depression, generalized anxiety disorder, panic disorder, and other mood-related conditions. Escitalopram, a selective serotonin reuptake inhibitor (SSRI), works by increasing serotonin levels in the brain to improve mood, reduce nervousness, and restore emotional balance. Clonazepam, a benzodiazepine, acts on the brain and nerves to produce a calming effect, reducing excessive anxiety, restlessness, and panic symptoms. Together, they provide relief from persistent sadness, worry, tension, and sleep disturbances, improving overall quality of life. The tablet is usually taken once daily, with or without food, as prescribed by the physician. Common side effects may include drowsiness, dizziness, nausea, headache, dry mouth, or fatigue, which are generally mild and temporary. Since clonazepam can cause dependence or withdrawal symptoms if stopped suddenly, the medicine should not be discontinued without medical advice. Caution is required in patients with liver or kidney disease, respiratory problems, or a history of substance abuse. It should be avoided with alcohol and used only under medical supervision to ensure safety and effectiveness. Store the tablet in a cool, dry place away from moisture and direct sunlight.

name: ESOZEAL 40 MG TAB
description: Esomeprazole 40 mg (gastro-resistant) tablet is a proton pump inhibitor (PPI) used to reduce excessive stomach acid production and treat conditions such as gastroesophageal reflux disease (GERD), peptic ulcers, Zollinger-Ellison syndrome, and erosive esophagitis. It works by blocking the proton pumps in the stomach lining, which are responsible for acid secretion, thereby relieving symptoms like heartburn, acid regurgitation, stomach pain, and difficulty swallowing. The gastro-resistant formulation ensures the tablet passes through the stomach without being destroyed by acid, allowing it to be absorbed in the intestine for maximum effectiveness. The tablet is usually taken once daily, 30–60 minutes before a meal, as prescribed by the doctor. Common side effects may include headache, nausea, diarrhea, constipation, stomach pain, or flatulence, while rare but serious effects include severe allergic reactions, low magnesium levels, or kidney problems. Long-term use may increase the risk of bone fractures, vitamin B12 deficiency, or gut infections. It should be used cautiously in patients with liver disease, low magnesium, or kidney problems. Store in a cool, dry place away from direct sunlight and moisture, and take only under medical supervision.

name: ESOZEAL-DSR CAP
description: Esomeprazole 40 mg + Domperidone 30 mg capsule is a combination medicine used to treat gastroesophageal reflux disease (GERD), acid reflux, heartburn, nausea, vomiting, and delayed stomach emptying. Esomeprazole, a proton pump inhibitor (PPI), reduces the production of stomach acid by blocking proton pumps in the stomach lining, providing relief from acid-related symptoms and preventing damage to the esophagus. Domperidone is a prokinetic agent that enhances stomach motility and accelerates gastric emptying, helping reduce bloating, nausea, and vomiting. Together, this combination provides effective relief from heartburn, indigestion, acid regurgitation, and associated gastrointestinal discomfort. The capsule is usually taken 30–60 minutes before meals, as prescribed by the doctor. Common side effects may include headache, dizziness, dry mouth, mild abdominal pain, diarrhea, or constipation, while rare but serious effects include irregular heartbeat, severe allergic reactions, or elevated liver enzymes. It should be used cautiously in patients with liver or kidney problems, heart conditions, or electrolyte imbalances. Store in a cool, dry place away from sunlight and moisture, and take only under medical supervision.

name: ETORIZ 90 TAB
description: Etoricoxib 90 mg tablet is a non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drug (NSAID) specifically classified as a selective COX-2 inhibitor, used to relieve pain and inflammation in conditions such as osteoarthritis, rheumatoid arthritis, ankylosing spondylitis, gout, and acute musculoskeletal pain. It works by selectively blocking the cyclooxygenase-2 (COX-2) enzyme, which is responsible for producing inflammatory chemicals called prostaglandins, thereby reducing pain, swelling, and stiffness while minimizing gastrointestinal side effects compared to non-selective NSAIDs. The tablet is usually taken once daily, with or without food, as prescribed by the doctor. Common side effects may include mild headache, dizziness, stomach upset, or swelling in the legs or feet, while rare but serious effects can include heart attack, stroke, high blood pressure, gastrointestinal bleeding, liver or kidney problems. It should be used with caution in patients with heart disease, kidney or liver impairment, hypertension, or a history of gastrointestinal ulcers. The medication should be taken at the lowest effective dose for the shortest possible duration. Store in a cool, dry place away from sunlight and moisture, and use only under medical supervision.

name: ETORIZ-TH4  TAB
description: Etoricoxib 60 mg + Thiocolchicoside 4 mg tablet is a combination medicine used to relieve pain, inflammation, and muscle stiffness associated with conditions such as back pain, muscle spasms, osteoarthritis, rheumatoid arthritis, and other musculoskeletal disorders. Etoricoxib is a selective COX-2 inhibitor that reduces inflammation and pain by blocking prostaglandin production, while Thiocolchicoside is a muscle relaxant that works on the central nervous system to relieve muscle spasms and improve mobility. Together, they provide effective relief from pain, swelling, and muscle stiffness, enhancing daily function and comfort. The tablet is usually taken once daily or as prescribed by the doctor, with or without food. Common side effects may include mild stomach upset, dizziness, headache, or drowsiness, while rare but serious effects can include gastrointestinal bleeding, liver or kidney problems, irregular heartbeat, or severe allergic reactions. Caution is advised in patients with heart disease, high blood pressure, kidney or liver impairment, or a history of ulcers. The medication should be taken at the lowest effective dose for the shortest duration needed. Store in a cool, dry place away from sunlight and moisture, and use strictly under medical supervision.

name: FEBUZEAL 40  TAB
description: Febuxostat 40 mg Tablet is a prescription medicine used to lower high uric acid levels in the blood, primarily for patients suffering from gout. It works by selectively inhibiting the enzyme xanthine oxidase, which is responsible for producing uric acid in the body. By reducing uric acid levels, it helps prevent gout attacks, joint pain, swelling, and other related complications. This medicine is generally prescribed when uric acid levels cannot be controlled by diet and lifestyle changes alone or when patients do not respond well to other uric acid-lowering treatments. Febuxostat 40 mg should be taken exactly as directed by a healthcare professional, usually once daily, with or without food. It is not intended for the treatment of high uric acid caused by cancer therapy or for asymptomatic hyperuricemia. Patients with liver, kidney, or heart conditions should use it cautiously under medical supervision. Common side effects may include nausea, joint pain, mild rash, or abnormal liver tests. Regular monitoring of uric acid levels and liver function is recommended during treatment to ensure safety and effectiveness.

name: FERZEAL-XT TAB
description: Ferrous Ascorbate 100 mg + Folic Acid 1.5 mg Tablet is a nutritional supplement used to treat and prevent iron deficiency anemia and folic acid deficiency. Ferrous Ascorbate provides elemental iron in a highly absorbable form, helping the body produce healthy red blood cells and improve oxygen transport, while Vitamin C in the compound enhances iron absorption. Folic Acid supports red blood cell formation and is especially important during pregnancy for proper development of the baby’s brain and spinal cord, thereby reducing the risk of neural tube defects. This tablet is commonly prescribed to pregnant and lactating women, individuals with anemia, or those with poor dietary intake. It helps reduce symptoms such as fatigue, weakness, and low immunity caused by anemia. The medicine should be taken as advised by a healthcare professional, usually after meals to minimize stomach upset. Common side effects may include nausea, constipation, or dark stools, which are generally mild and temporary. Regular monitoring of hemoglobin and iron levels is recommended during treatment to ensure safety and effectiveness.

attributes.CONTAIN: Ferrous Ascorbate 100 Mg + Folic 1.5 Mg Tablet

name: FEXOL 180 TAB
description: Fexofenadine Hydrochloride 180 mg tablet is a non-sedating antihistamine used to relieve allergy symptoms such as sneezing, runny nose, itchy or watery eyes, and hives caused by conditions like seasonal allergic rhinitis and chronic idiopathic urticaria. It works by blocking the action of histamine, a natural substance in the body responsible for allergy symptoms, thereby reducing inflammation, itching, and swelling. Unlike older antihistamines, fexofenadine causes minimal drowsiness, allowing patients to continue daily activities without significant sedation. The tablet is usually taken once daily, with water, and can be taken with or without food. Common side effects are mild and may include headache, nausea, dizziness, or stomach upset, while serious side effects are rare but may include severe allergic reactions or rapid heartbeat. It should be used cautiously in patients with kidney or liver impairment and is not recommended for children under a specified age unless advised by a doctor. Store in a cool, dry place away from sunlight and moisture, and use strictly under medical supervision.

name: FLUPEZ-M 0.5/10 TAB
description: Flupentixol 0.5 mg + Melitracen 10 mg tablet is a combination medicine used to manage mild to moderate depression, anxiety, and stress-related disorders. Flupentixol is a low-dose antipsychotic that works by modulating neurotransmitters in the brain, particularly dopamine, to improve mood, reduce irritability, and enhance motivation. Melitracen is a tricyclic antidepressant that helps balance serotonin and norepinephrine levels, alleviating symptoms such as sadness, fatigue, and low energy. Together, this combination provides both mood-lifting and anti-anxiety effects, helping patients feel more motivated, focused, and emotionally stable. The tablet is usually taken once daily or as prescribed by the doctor, with or without food. Common side effects may include mild drowsiness, dry mouth, dizziness, headache, or constipation, while serious but rare effects include abnormal heart rhythms, severe allergic reactions, or worsening mood. It should be used cautiously in patients with heart disease, liver or kidney impairment, epilepsy, or a history of suicidal thoughts. Abrupt discontinuation should be avoided, and treatment should always follow medical guidance. Store in a cool, dry place away from sunlight and moisture, and use strictly under medical supervision.

name: FLUZEAL 150  TAB
description: Fluconazole 150 mg tablet is an antifungal medication used to treat a variety of fungal infections, including yeast infections of the mouth, throat, esophagus, and vagina, as well as systemic fungal infections. It works by inhibiting the enzyme responsible for producing ergosterol, an essential component of the fungal cell membrane, thereby weakening the fungus and stopping its growth. The tablet is usually taken as a single dose or as prescribed by a doctor, depending on the type and severity of the infection. Common side effects may include headache, nausea, stomach upset, diarrhea, or dizziness, while rare but serious effects can include liver problems, severe allergic reactions, irregular heartbeat, or changes in taste. Fluconazole should be used cautiously in patients with liver or kidney disease and those taking other medications that may interact with it. Adequate hydration is recommended during treatment. Store the tablet in a cool, dry place away from direct sunlight and moisture, and take strictly under medical supervision.

name: GABAZAC-M TAB
description: Gabapentin 300 mg + Methylcobalamin 500 mcg tablet is a combination medicine used to manage nerve-related pain, neuropathy, and certain neurological disorders. Gabapentin is an anticonvulsant that works by stabilizing overactive nerve signals, reducing nerve pain, tingling, and burning sensations commonly seen in diabetic neuropathy, postherpetic neuralgia, or peripheral neuropathies. Methylcobalamin, the active form of vitamin B12, supports nerve repair, regeneration, and proper functioning, improving overall nerve health and reducing symptoms of numbness or weakness. Together, this combination helps relieve nerve pain, improve sensory function, and enhance quality of life. The tablet is usually taken as prescribed by the doctor, with or without food, typically 1–3 times daily depending on the condition. Common side effects may include dizziness, drowsiness, nausea, or mild gastrointestinal discomfort, while rare but serious effects can include allergic reactions or severe fatigue. Caution is advised in patients with kidney or liver impairment, and the medication should be used strictly under medical supervision. Store in a cool, dry place away from sunlight and moisture.

name: GABAZAC-NT 400/10 TAB
description: Gabapentin 400 mg + Nortriptyline Hydrochloride 10 mg tablet is a combination medicine used to treat neuropathic pain caused by conditions such as diabetes, shingles (postherpetic neuralgia), nerve injuries, or chronic pain disorders. Gabapentin is an anticonvulsant that calms overactive nerves by modulating abnormal electrical activity in the brain, reducing pain signals and providing relief from burning, tingling, or stabbing sensations. Nortriptyline, a tricyclic antidepressant, enhances the levels of serotonin and norepinephrine in the nervous system, improving mood and further reducing pain perception. Together, they provide effective control of nerve-related pain and improve sleep quality and overall functioning. The tablet is usually taken once or twice daily, with or without food, as prescribed by the doctor. Common side effects may include dizziness, drowsiness, dry mouth, constipation, blurred vision, or weight gain, while serious but rare effects can include mood changes, irregular heartbeat, or allergic reactions. Caution is advised in patients with heart disease, liver or kidney problems, glaucoma, or a history of seizures. The medicine should not be stopped abruptly without medical advice to avoid withdrawal symptoms. Store in a cool, dry place away from moisture and sunlight, and use only under medical supervision.

attributes.CONTAIN: Gabapentin 400 mg + Nortriptlyline hydrochloride 10 mg Tablet

name: GLICAZ-M 80 TAB
description: Gliclazide 80 mg + Metformin 500 mg tablet is an oral antidiabetic combination used to control blood sugar levels in patients with type 2 diabetes mellitus. Gliclazide is a sulfonylurea that works by stimulating the pancreas to release more insulin, thereby lowering blood glucose. Metformin is a biguanide that reduces glucose production in the liver, decreases intestinal absorption of sugar, and improves the body’s sensitivity to insulin. Together, they provide better blood sugar control, reduce the risk of diabetes-related complications such as kidney damage, nerve problems, and heart disease, and help maintain overall metabolic balance. The tablet is usually taken with meals to reduce gastrointestinal side effects and as prescribed by the doctor. Common side effects may include nausea, stomach upset, diarrhea, headache, or dizziness, while rare but serious effects include low blood sugar (hypoglycemia), lactic acidosis, or allergic reactions. Caution is advised in patients with kidney or liver disease, heart problems, or those consuming alcohol regularly. Regular monitoring of blood sugar levels, healthy diet, and exercise are important for effective diabetes management. Store the medicine in a cool, dry place away from moisture and sunlight, and use strictly under medical supervision.

name: GLICAZ 60 MR TAB
description: Gliclazide 60 mg (MR) tablet is an oral antidiabetic medicine belonging to the sulfonylurea class, used to manage type 2 diabetes mellitus. It works by stimulating the pancreas to release more insulin, thereby helping to lower and control blood sugar levels effectively. The “MR” (modified release) formulation ensures a gradual and sustained release of the drug in the body, providing long-lasting control of blood glucose with once-daily dosing. Regular use of gliclazide helps prevent complications of diabetes such as kidney damage, eye problems, nerve disorders, and heart disease. The tablet is usually taken with breakfast or the first main meal of the day, as prescribed by the doctor. Common side effects may include mild stomach upset, nausea, headache, or dizziness, while a possible serious effect is hypoglycemia (low blood sugar), especially if meals are skipped, alcohol is consumed, or excessive exercise is done. It should be used cautiously in patients with kidney or liver disease and is not recommended for type 1 diabetes or diabetic ketoacidosis. A balanced diet, regular physical activity, and routine monitoring of blood sugar are essential along with this medication. Store in a cool, dry place away from moisture and direct sunlight.

name: GLIMIL 1 TAB
description: Glimepiride 1 mg tablet is an oral antidiabetic medicine belonging to the sulfonylurea class, used to manage type 2 diabetes mellitus. It works by stimulating the pancreas to release more insulin and increasing the body’s sensitivity to it, thereby lowering and controlling blood sugar levels. Regular use of glimepiride, along with a proper diet and exercise, helps prevent long-term complications of diabetes such as kidney damage, nerve problems, vision loss, and cardiovascular disease. The tablet is usually taken once daily with breakfast or the first main meal of the day, as prescribed by the doctor. Common side effects may include low blood sugar (hypoglycemia), dizziness, headache, nausea, or weight gain, while serious but rare effects can include severe allergic reactions, liver problems, or vision changes. The risk of hypoglycemia is higher if meals are skipped, alcohol is consumed, or excessive exercise is done without proper dietary intake. It should be used cautiously in patients with kidney or liver impairment and is not suitable for type 1 diabetes or diabetic ketoacidosis. Regular monitoring of blood glucose, adherence to medical advice, and lifestyle modifications are essential for best results. Store in a cool, dry place away from heat and moisture.

name: GLIMIL 2 TAB
description: Glimepiride 2 mg tablet is an oral antidiabetic medicine from the sulfonylurea class, prescribed to control blood sugar levels in patients with type 2 diabetes mellitus. It works by stimulating the pancreas to release more insulin and improving the body’s ability to use it effectively, thereby lowering blood glucose. When combined with a proper diet, regular exercise, and lifestyle changes, glimepiride helps reduce the risk of serious diabetes-related complications such as kidney damage, nerve problems, vision loss, and heart disease. The tablet is usually taken once daily with breakfast or the first main meal, as directed by the doctor. Common side effects may include low blood sugar (hypoglycemia), dizziness, headache, nausea, or weight gain, while rare but serious side effects can include severe allergic reactions, liver dysfunction, or visual disturbances. The risk of hypoglycemia increases if meals are skipped, alcohol is consumed, or heavy exercise is done without adequate food intake. Caution is advised in patients with kidney or liver problems, and it is not suitable for type 1 diabetes or diabetic ketoacidosis. Regular monitoring of blood glucose and following medical advice are essential for safe and effective treatment. Store in a cool, dry place away from moisture and sunlight.

name: GLIMIL-M 0.5 TAB
description: Glimepiride 0.5 mg + Metformin Hydrochloride 500 mg tablet is an oral antidiabetic combination used in the management of type 2 diabetes mellitus. Glimepiride is a sulfonylurea that stimulates the pancreas to release more insulin, thereby lowering blood glucose levels, while Metformin is a biguanide that decreases glucose production in the liver, improves insulin sensitivity, and reduces sugar absorption from the intestines. Together, they provide better blood sugar control than either drug alone, helping to prevent long-term diabetes complications such as kidney damage, nerve problems, heart disease, and vision loss. name: IVADIL 5 MG TAB
description: Ivabradine Hydrochloride 5 mg tablet is a cardiovascular medicine used to manage chronic stable angina (chest pain) and certain types of heart failure. It works by selectively inhibiting the If (“funny”) channels in the sinoatrial node of the heart, which slows the heart rate without affecting blood pressure or heart muscle contractility. By reducing heart rate, ivabradine decreases the heart’s oxygen demand, relieving symptoms of angina and improving exercise tolerance and quality of life in patients with heart failure. The tablet is usually taken twice daily, with or without food, as prescribed by the doctor. Common side effects may include bradycardia (slow heart rate), dizziness, fatigue, headache, or visual disturbances such as temporary brightness in vision, while rare but serious effects include irregular heartbeat, severe hypotension, or heart rhythm disorders. It should be used cautiously in patients with low blood pressure, severe heart failure, or conduction disorders and is contraindicated in acute heart attack or uncontrolled arrhythmias. name: NAPRON-D 500 TAB

name: NEBIZEAL 2.5 TAB

This dual action makes it particularly effective and well-tolerated in elderly patients or those with co-existing conditions. It is usually prescribed once daily, with or without food, and should be taken at the same time each day for maximum benefit. Common side effects may include headache, dizziness, fatigue, slow heart rate, or gastrointestinal discomfort. Caution is required in patients with asthma, severe heart failure, liver problems, or circulation disorders. Regular monitoring of blood pressure and heart rate is advised during treatment. This medicine should only be used under medical supervision, and sudden discontinuation should be avoided to prevent rebound hypertension or heart complications.

By reducing the production of low-density lipoprotein (LDL) cholesterol and triglycerides, and modestly increasing high-density lipoprotein (HDL) cholesterol, Rosuvastatin helps prevent plaque buildup in arteries, improving blood flow and cardiovascular health. The tablet is usually taken once daily, with or without food, preferably at the same time each day, as prescribed by a healthcare professional. Valsartan, an angiotensin II receptor blocker (ARB), relaxes blood vessels, lowers blood pressure, and decreases the workload on the heart by blocking the effects of angiotensin II, a substance that narrows blood vessels. Together, this combination improves symptoms of heart failure such as shortness of breath, fatigue, and fluid retention while supporting long-term cardiac function. The tablet is usually taken twice daily, with or without food, as prescribed by a healthcare professional, and should be taken consistently at the same times each day. Common side effects may include dizziness, hypotension, mild kidney function changes, or elevated potassium levels, while rare but serious effects can include severe hypotension, kidney impairment, or allergic reactions. Regular monitoring of blood pressure, kidney function, electrolytes, adherence to prescribed dosage, lifestyle modifications, and follow-up with a healthcare professional ensures safe and effective therapy.

name: SITAZ 100 TAB
description: Sitagliptin 100 mg tablet is an oral antidiabetic medication used to manage type 2 diabetes mellitus by helping control blood sugar levels. It belongs to the class of dipeptidyl peptidase-4 (DPP-4) inhibitors, which work by enhancing the body’s natural ability to lower blood glucose. Sitagliptin increases levels of incretin hormones, which stimulate insulin release from the pancreas in response to meals and decrease the production of glucose by the liver. This helps reduce both fasting and postprandial blood sugar levels, improving overall glycemic control. The tablet is usually taken once daily, with or without food, as prescribed by a healthcare professional, and should be taken at the same time each day for optimal effectiveness. Common side effects may include mild gastrointestinal discomfort, headache, or upper respiratory tract symptoms, while rare but serious effects can include severe allergic reactions, pancreatitis, or changes in kidney function. Sitagliptin is often used alone or in combination with other antidiabetic medications, along with lifestyle modifications such as a balanced diet, regular exercise, and weight management, to enhance its effectiveness. Regular monitoring of blood sugar levels, kidney function, and adherence to prescribed therapy ensures safe and effective diabetes management.

name: SILORIDE 8 D CAP
description: Dutasteride 0.5 mg + Silodosin 8 mg capsule is a combination medication used to manage symptoms of benign prostatic hyperplasia (BPH), commonly known as an enlarged prostate, which can cause difficulty in urination, weak urine flow, frequent urination, or nighttime urination. Dutasteride, a 5-alpha reductase inhibitor, works by blocking the conversion of testosterone to dihydrotestosterone (DHT), a hormone responsible for prostate enlargement, which helps reduce prostate size over time and improves urinary flow. Silodosin, an alpha-1 adrenergic receptor antagonist, relaxes the smooth muscles in the prostate and bladder neck, allowing easier urine passage and relieving urinary obstruction symptoms. Taken together, this combination addresses both the mechanical obstruction and hormonal causes of BPH, providing symptomatic relief and improving quality of life. The capsule is usually taken once daily, with or without food, as prescribed by a healthcare professional, and should be taken at the same time each day. Common side effects may include dizziness, headache, retrograde ejaculation, or mild gastrointestinal discomfort, while rare but serious effects can include allergic reactions, low blood pressure, or liver dysfunction. Regular monitoring, adherence to the prescribed regimen, and follow-up with a healthcare professional ensure safe and effective treatment.

name: SODICURE 500 TAB
description: Sodium Bicarbonate 500 mg tablet is an antacid and alkalizing agent used to relieve symptoms of indigestion, heartburn, acid reflux, and upset stomach caused by excess stomach acid.
