name: TELTAZ 20 TAB
description: Telmisartan 20 mg tablet is an antihypertensive medication used to manage high blood pressure (hypertension) and reduce the risk of cardiovascular events such as heart attack, stroke, and heart failure. It belongs to the class of angiotensin II receptor blockers (ARBs), which work by blocking the action of angiotensin II, a hormone that causes blood vessels to constrict. By relaxing blood vessels, Telmisartan lowers vascular resistance, improves blood flow, and decreases the workload on the heart, helping maintain normal blood pressure levels. The tablet is typically taken once daily, with or without food, as prescribed by a healthcare professional, preferably at the same time each day for optimal efficacy. Common side effects may include dizziness, headache, fatigue, or mild gastrointestinal discomfort, while rare but serious effects can include kidney dysfunction, hyperkalemia (high potassium levels), or severe hypotension. Caution is advised in patients with kidney or liver impairment, volume depletion, or those taking other medications that may interact with Telmisartan. Regular monitoring of blood pressure, kidney function, and electrolyte levels, along with adherence to prescribed dosage, lifestyle modifications, a low-sodium diet, regular exercise, and medical supervision, ensures safe and effective management of hypertension and supports long-term cardiovascular health.

name: TELTAZ-H 40 TAB

name: THYROZEAL 100 MCG TAB

By supplementing the body with exogenous thyroxine, this medication restores normal thyroid hormone levels, supporting proper metabolism, growth, and energy regulation. The tablet is usually taken once daily on an empty stomach, preferably in the morning, at least 30–60 minutes before food, as prescribed by a healthcare professional, and should be taken consistently at the same time each day for optimal absorption and efficacy. Dose adjustments may be required based on regular monitoring of thyroid function tests, especially in elderly patients, those with heart disease, or during pregnancy. Consistent adherence to prescribed dosage, medical supervision, and periodic laboratory evaluations ensure safe and effective management of hypothyroidism, promoting normal metabolism, energy levels, and overall health.

name: TICAZEAL 90 TAB
description: Ticagrelor 90 mg tablet is an antiplatelet medication used to prevent blood clots in patients with acute coronary syndrome (ACS), a history of heart attack, or other cardiovascular conditions, thereby reducing the risk of heart attack, stroke, or cardiovascular death. It works by inhibiting the P2Y12 receptor on platelets, preventing platelet aggregation and reducing the formation of harmful blood clots in the arteries. Unlike some other antiplatelet agents, Ticagrelor provides reversible inhibition of platelet function, offering rapid onset and offset of action, which can be advantageous in certain clinical scenarios. The tablet is usually taken orally twice daily, with or without food, as prescribed by a healthcare professional, and should be taken consistently at the same times each day for effective cardiovascular protection. Common side effects may include shortness of breath, dizziness, headache, or mild gastrointestinal discomfort, while rare but serious effects can include severe bleeding, allergic reactions, or thrombocytopenia. Patients should avoid abrupt discontinuation without medical advice, as this may increase the risk of cardiovascular events. Regular monitoring, adherence to the prescribed dosage, and concurrent management of other cardiovascular risk factors, such as hypertension, diabetes, and high cholesterol, ensure safe and effective long-term use of Ticagrelor to protect heart health.

name: TOFAZEAL 5 TAB
description: Tofacitinib Citrate 5 mg tablet is an oral medication used to treat autoimmune conditions such as rheumatoid arthritis, psoriatic arthritis, and ulcerative colitis by reducing inflammation, pain, and joint damage. It belongs to the class of Janus kinase (JAK) inhibitors, which work by blocking the activity of specific enzymes (JAK1 and JAK3) involved in the signaling pathways that drive immune system overactivity, thereby modulating the body’s immune response. This helps control chronic inflammation, relieve joint pain and stiffness, and improve physical function and quality of life in patients with autoimmune disorders. The tablet is usually taken orally twice daily, with or without food, as prescribed by a healthcare professional, and should be taken at the same times each day to maintain consistent blood levels. Common side effects may include headache, upper respiratory tract infections, diarrhea, or mild nausea, while rare but serious effects can include serious infections, blood clots, liver dysfunction, or changes in blood cell counts. Regular monitoring of blood counts, liver function, and overall health, along with adherence to the prescribed dosage and medical supervision, is essential to ensure safe and effective long-term management of autoimmune conditions with Tofacitinib.

name: TORZEAL 10  TAB
description: Torsemide 10 mg tablet is a loop diuretic medication used to treat conditions such as edema associated with heart failure, liver cirrhosis, or kidney disease, and to manage high blood pressure (hypertension). It works by inhibiting the reabsorption of sodium and chloride in the loop of Henle in the kidneys, which increases urine output and reduces excess fluid accumulation in the body. By decreasing fluid volume, Torsemide helps relieve swelling, shortness of breath, and other symptoms related to fluid retention, while also contributing to lower blood pressure. The tablet is usually taken once daily, with or without food, as prescribed by a healthcare professional, and should be taken at the same time each day for consistent effect. Common side effects may include increased urination, dizziness, dehydration, or electrolyte imbalances, while rare but serious effects can include kidney dysfunction, severe hypotension, or allergic reactions. Regular monitoring of blood pressure, kidney function, and electrolyte levels, along with adherence to the prescribed dosage and lifestyle measures such as a balanced diet and adequate hydration, ensures safe and effective management of edema and hypertension with Torsemide, improving overall cardiovascular and kidney health and enhancing quality of life.

name: TRIMEZ 35 MR TAB
description: Trimetazidine Hydrochloride 35 mg tablet is a metabolic agent used to manage angina pectoris (chest pain) and other cardiovascular conditions by improving the heart’s efficiency and oxygen utilization. It works by optimizing the energy metabolism of heart muscle cells, shifting energy production from fatty acid oxidation to glucose oxidation, which requires less oxygen and helps maintain proper cardiac function during reduced blood flow. This mechanism helps reduce the frequency and severity of angina attacks, improves exercise tolerance, and protects heart tissue from ischemic damage. The tablet is usually taken orally twice daily, with or without food, as prescribed by a healthcare professional, and should be taken consistently at the same times each day for optimal benefit. Common side effects may include mild gastrointestinal discomfort, headache, or dizziness, while rare but serious effects can include movement disorders, allergic reactions, or sleep disturbances. Trimetazidine is not a primary treatment for acute angina attacks, and patients should continue prescribed medications such as nitrates, beta-blockers, or calcium channel blockers as advised. Regular medical supervision, adherence to the prescribed dosage, and lifestyle modifications including a heart-healthy diet, regular exercise, and avoidance of smoking ensure safe and effective management of angina, improving cardiac health and overall quality of life.

name: URIZEAL-D TAB
description: Tamsulosin HCl 0.4 mg + Dutasteride 0.5 mg tablet is a combination medication used to treat benign prostatic hyperplasia (BPH), a condition characterized by an enlarged prostate that can cause urinary symptoms such as difficulty in urination, weak stream, frequent urination, and incomplete bladder emptying. Tamsulosin, an alpha-1 adrenergic receptor blocker, works by relaxing the smooth muscles in the prostate and bladder neck, improving urine flow and reducing urinary symptoms. Dutasteride, a 5-alpha-reductase inhibitor, reduces the conversion of testosterone to dihydrotestosterone (DHT), a hormone responsible for prostate enlargement, thereby helping to shrink the prostate over time and prevent further progression of BPH. The tablet is usually taken once daily, about 30 minutes after the same meal each day, as prescribed by a healthcare professional, and patients should adhere to the regimen consistently for optimal benefit. Common side effects may include dizziness, headache, or mild gastrointestinal discomfort, while rare but serious effects can include allergic reactions, decreased libido, or changes in sexual function. Regular monitoring by a healthcare professional, adherence to the prescribed dosage, and ongoing evaluation of urinary symptoms ensure safe and effective management of BPH, improving urinary function, reducing complications, and enhancing quality of life.

name: URIZEAL 0.4 TAB
description: Tamsulosin Hydrochloride 0.4 mg tablet is an alpha-1 adrenergic receptor blocker used to treat benign prostatic hyperplasia (BPH), a condition in which the prostate gland enlarges, causing urinary symptoms such as difficulty in urination, weak stream, frequent urination, nocturia, and incomplete bladder emptying. By selectively relaxing the smooth muscles in the prostate and bladder neck, Tamsulosin improves urine flow, reduces urinary obstruction, and alleviates lower urinary tract symptoms associated with BPH. The tablet is usually taken orally once daily, approximately 30 minutes after the same meal each day, as prescribed by a healthcare professional, and should be taken consistently at the same time for optimal efficacy. Common side effects may include dizziness, headache, mild hypotension, or ejaculatory disturbances, while rare but serious effects can include severe allergic reactions, fainting, or significant blood pressure drops. Patients should avoid abrupt discontinuation and be cautious when changing positions quickly to reduce the risk of dizziness or fainting. Regular follow-up with a healthcare provider, adherence to the prescribed dosage, and monitoring of urinary function and overall health are essential to ensure safe and effective management of BPH, improving quality of life and reducing complications such as urinary retention or kidney problems.

name: URSOZEAL 300  TAB
description: Ursodeoxycholic Acid 300 mg tablet is a bile acid used to treat liver and gallbladder disorders, including primary biliary cholangitis, non-alcoholic fatty liver disease, and to dissolve certain types of gallstones in patients who cannot undergo surgery. It works by reducing cholesterol absorption and secretion in bile, thereby decreasing cholesterol saturation in the bile and gradually dissolving cholesterol-based gallstones. Additionally, it protects liver cells from toxic bile acids, improves bile flow, and reduces liver inflammation, helping to maintain normal liver function and prevent disease progression. The tablet is usually taken orally once or twice daily, with or without food, as prescribed by a healthcare professional, and should be taken consistently at the same times for optimal effectiveness. Common side effects may include mild gastrointestinal discomfort, diarrhea, or nausea, while rare but serious effects can include severe allergic reactions or liver function abnormalities. Regular monitoring of liver function tests, adherence to the prescribed dosage, and follow-up with a healthcare provider are essential for safe and effective treatment. Combined with lifestyle measures such as a balanced diet, avoidance of alcohol, and weight management, Ursodeoxycholic Acid supports liver health, promotes gallstone dissolution, and improves overall digestive and metabolic function.

name: VILDACURE 100  TAB
description: Vildagliptin 100 mg tablet is an oral antidiabetic medication used to manage type 2 diabetes mellitus by improving blood glucose control. It belongs to the class of dipeptidyl peptidase-4 (DPP-4) inhibitors, which work by increasing the levels of incretin hormones, such as GLP-1 and GIP, in the body. These hormones stimulate insulin release from the pancreas in response to meals and suppress excessive glucagon secretion, thereby helping to lower postprandial and fasting blood glucose levels. Vildagliptin is usually taken orally once or twice daily, with or without food, as prescribed by a healthcare professional, and should be taken consistently at the same times each day for optimal efficacy. Common side effects may include mild headache, dizziness, or gastrointestinal discomfort, while rare but serious effects can include pancreatitis, severe allergic reactions, or liver enzyme abnormalities. Regular monitoring of blood glucose, HbA1c levels, kidney function, and overall health, along with adherence to prescribed dosage and lifestyle modifications such as a balanced diet, regular exercise, and weight management, ensures safe and effective diabetes control. Vildagliptin helps reduce hyperglycemia, prevents complications associated with prolonged high blood sugar, and improves overall metabolic health and quality of life for patients with type 2 diabetes.

description: Voglibose 0.3 mg tablet is an oral antidiabetic medication used to manage type 2 diabetes mellitus by controlling postprandial blood sugar levels. name: ZEMET 500 TAB
description: Metformin 500 mg Tablet is an oral antidiabetic medicine widely used as a first-line therapy for the management of type 2 diabetes mellitus. It belongs to the biguanide class of drugs and works by lowering blood sugar levels through multiple mechanisms. Metformin primarily reduces hepatic glucose production, enhances insulin sensitivity, and improves peripheral glucose uptake and utilization by muscles, while also decreasing intestinal absorption of glucose. Unlike many other antidiabetic agents, it does not cause significant weight gain and is often associated with modest weight reduction, making it particularly beneficial in overweight or obese patients with diabetes. The medicine helps achieve better glycemic control, thereby reducing the risk of long-term diabetes-related complications such as neuropathy, nephropathy, retinopathy, and cardiovascular diseases. It may also improve lipid profiles and support overall metabolic health. Metformin 500 mg Tablet is usually prescribed as part of a comprehensive treatment plan that includes diet modification, regular physical activity, and lifestyle changes. Common side effects may include gastrointestinal disturbances such as nausea, diarrhea, or abdominal discomfort, which generally subside with continued use. This tablet is not intended for patients with severe kidney or liver impairment. Regular monitoring of blood sugar and kidney function is recommended during therapy.

name: ZEPANTA-D TAB
description: Pantoprazole 40 mg + Domperidone 10 mg Tablet is a combination medicine used to manage gastrointestinal conditions associated with excess stomach acid and reflux. Pantoprazole, a proton pump inhibitor (PPI), works by irreversibly blocking the proton pumps in the stomach lining, thereby reducing gastric acid secretion and providing relief from acid-related disorders such as gastroesophageal reflux disease (GERD), peptic ulcers, and Zollinger-Ellison syndrome. Domperidone, a prokinetic agent, enhances gastrointestinal motility by blocking dopamine receptors in the gut and upper digestive tract, which helps speed up stomach emptying, improves esophageal clearance, and reduces symptoms of nausea, vomiting, bloating, and a sensation of fullness. Together, they provide dual benefits: Pantoprazole controls excessive stomach acid and prevents irritation, while Domperidone relieves associated discomfort caused by delayed gastric emptying and reflux. This combination helps reduce heartburn, regurgitation, and related symptoms, thereby improving digestive comfort and quality of life. The medicine is generally prescribed in cases where acid suppression alone is insufficient, particularly in patients with GERD accompanied by nausea or motility-related symptoms. Common side effects may include headache, dizziness, abdominal pain, dry mouth, and diarrhea. It should be taken as directed by a physician, usually before meals, and is not advised for long-term use without medical supervision.

name: ZEPANTA-DSR CAP
description: Pantoprazole 40 mg + Domperidone 30 mg Capsule is a dual-acting medication prescribed for the treatment of gastrointestinal disorders caused by excessive stomach acid and impaired gastric motility. Pantoprazole, a proton pump inhibitor (PPI), reduces stomach acid secretion by blocking proton pumps in the gastric lining, thereby relieving conditions such as gastroesophageal reflux disease (GERD), acid reflux, gastritis, peptic ulcers, and Zollinger–Ellison syndrome. Domperidone, a dopamine receptor antagonist with strong prokinetic properties, enhances gastrointestinal motility by promoting faster gastric emptying, improving esophageal clearance, and reducing nausea, bloating, and a sensation of fullness. The higher dose of Domperidone in this combination makes it particularly effective in patients with persistent reflux, delayed gastric emptying, or acid-related conditions accompanied by nausea and vomiting. Together, this formulation provides comprehensive relief by reducing excess stomach acid while improving digestive motility, thereby controlling symptoms such as heartburn, regurgitation, indigestion, and abdominal discomfort. It is usually prescribed before meals to maximize effectiveness. Common side effects may include headache, dizziness, diarrhea, abdominal cramps, or dry mouth. Prolonged or unsupervised use should be avoided, as long-term therapy may increase risks such as vitamin deficiencies or cardiac side effects with Domperidone. The medicine should be taken strictly under medical supervision.

name: ZEPANTA-IT CAP
description: Pantoprazole 40 mg + Itopride Hydrochloride 150 mg Capsule is a combination medicine used for the management of gastroesophageal reflux disease (GERD), gastritis, peptic ulcers, and other acid-related disorders associated with delayed gastric emptying. Pantoprazole, a proton pump inhibitor (PPI), works by irreversibly blocking gastric proton pumps in the stomach lining, thereby suppressing excessive acid secretion and providing long-lasting relief from symptoms such as heartburn, acidity, and irritation. Itopride Hydrochloride, a prokinetic agent with both dopamine D2 receptor antagonist and acetylcholinesterase inhibitory actions, enhances gastrointestinal motility, accelerates gastric emptying, and reduces nausea, bloating, and abdominal discomfort. This synergistic combination provides dual benefits by controlling hyperacidity and improving gastric motility, making it highly effective in patients with reflux symptoms unresponsive to acid suppression alone. It is commonly prescribed for conditions like reflux esophagitis, functional dyspepsia, and indigestion with associated regurgitation or delayed stomach emptying. The medicine should ideally be taken before meals for maximum efficacy. Possible side effects may include headache, diarrhea, dizziness, abdominal pain, or mild gastrointestinal disturbances. Prolonged or unsupervised use should be avoided, and patients with liver, kidney, or cardiac issues must take it only under medical supervision.

name: ZEPANTA-LS CAP
description: Pantoprazole 40 mg + Levosulpiride 75 mg Capsule is a combination medicine used for the treatment of gastroesophageal reflux disease (GERD), gastritis, peptic ulcers, and other acid-related disorders associated with delayed gastric emptying and indigestion. Pantoprazole, a proton pump inhibitor (PPI), works by suppressing excess stomach acid production through inhibition of proton pumps in the gastric lining, thereby providing relief from symptoms such as heartburn, acidity, and irritation of the esophagus. Levosulpiride, a prokinetic and selective dopamine D2 receptor antagonist, enhances gastric motility, accelerates stomach emptying, and reduces nausea, bloating, and discomfort caused by slow gastric movements. Together, this combination provides dual benefits by controlling hyperacidity while improving gastrointestinal motility, making it effective in managing reflux esophagitis, functional dyspepsia, and related digestive conditions. It is generally recommended to take this medicine before meals for better results. Common side effects may include headache, abdominal discomfort, diarrhea, dizziness, or mild drowsiness. Prolonged or unsupervised use should be avoided, and the medication must be taken strictly under medical supervision, especially in patients with liver, kidney, heart, or hormonal disorders.

name: ZEPENTA 40 TAB
description: Pantoprazole 40 mg Tablet is a proton pump inhibitor (PPI) medicine commonly prescribed for the treatment of gastroesophageal reflux disease (GERD), Zollinger-Ellison syndrome, gastric ulcers, duodenal ulcers, and other acid-related disorders. It works by irreversibly blocking the proton pumps (H+/K+ ATPase) in the stomach lining, thereby significantly reducing the production of excess gastric acid. By lowering acid secretion, Pantoprazole helps in relieving symptoms such as heartburn, acidity, regurgitation, and irritation of the esophagus caused by acid reflux. It also promotes healing of ulcers and prevents recurrence of acid-related damage to the gastrointestinal tract. The tablet is generally taken once daily, preferably before meals, for maximum effectiveness. Common side effects may include headache, nausea, abdominal pain, bloating, flatulence, diarrhea, or dizziness, though these are usually mild and temporary. Prolonged or unsupervised use should be avoided, as it may increase the risk of vitamin B12 deficiency, magnesium imbalance, or bone weakness. Pantoprazole 40 mg Tablet should only be used under medical guidance, especially in patients with liver disorders or those taking other long-term medications, to ensure safety and effectiveness.

name: ZOSART 50 TAB
description: Losartan Potassium 50 mg Tablet is an angiotensin II receptor blocker (ARB) used to manage high blood pressure (hypertension) and protect the heart and kidneys from damage caused by uncontrolled blood pressure or diabetes. It works by blocking the action of angiotensin II, a natural substance that causes blood vessels to tighten and narrow, thereby allowing the vessels to relax and blood to flow more easily. This helps lower blood pressure, reduce strain on the heart, and improve circulation. Losartan is also prescribed to lower the risk of stroke in patients with hypertension and left ventricular hypertrophy, and to slow kidney damage in people with type 2 diabetes. The tablet is usually taken once daily, with or without food, as directed by a doctor. Common side effects may include dizziness, fatigue, nasal congestion, or back pain, which are generally mild. In rare cases, it may cause high potassium levels or kidney function changes, so regular monitoring is recommended. Losartan Potassium 50 mg Tablet should be taken consistently at the same time each day, and treatment should not be stopped suddenly without medical advice.

name: ZOSART - AM TAB
description: Losartan Potassium 50 mg + Amlodipine 5 mg Tablet is a fixed-dose combination medicine used to treat high blood pressure (hypertension) and reduce the risk of heart-related complications such as stroke, heart attack, and kidney damage. Losartan is an angiotensin II receptor blocker (ARB) that relaxes and widens blood vessels by blocking the effects of angiotensin II, while Amlodipine is a calcium channel blocker (CCB) that prevents calcium from entering the smooth muscles of the heart and blood vessels, leading to improved blood flow and reduced workload on the heart. Together, they provide better blood pressure control than either drug alone. The tablet is usually taken once daily, with or without food, at the same time each day for best results. Common side effects may include dizziness, headache, ankle swelling, flushing, or fatigue, which are usually mild and temporary. Rarely, it may cause changes in kidney function, increased potassium levels, or excessive lowering of blood pressure, so regular monitoring is advised. This medicine should be taken only under medical supervision, and patients should not stop treatment abruptly without consulting their doctor, as it may worsen blood pressure or heart conditions.

name: ZOSART-H TAB
description: Losartan Potassium 50 mg + Hydrochlorothiazide 12.5 mg Tablet is a combination medicine used for the treatment of high blood pressure (hypertension) and for reducing the risk of heart-related complications, including stroke, heart attack, and kidney damage. Losartan, an angiotensin II receptor blocker (ARB), relaxes and widens blood vessels by blocking the action of angiotensin II, thereby lowering blood pressure and improving blood flow. Hydrochlorothiazide, a thiazide diuretic, works by increasing the excretion of sodium and water from the body, reducing fluid volume, and further lowering blood pressure. The dual mechanism of action provides more effective and sustained blood pressure control compared to either drug alone. The tablet is usually taken once daily, with or without food, and should be taken at the same time each day for optimal results. Common side effects may include dizziness, headache, fatigue, increased urination, or mild electrolyte imbalances, which are usually manageable. Rarely, it may affect kidney function or cause excessive lowering of blood pressure. This medicine should be taken only under medical supervision, and patients should not discontinue therapy without consulting a healthcare professional.
